players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I am innocent and need your help"
Diana: "I am the detective and I believe Alice is the mafioso. Keep an eye on her."
Bob: "I am innocent and have no idea who the mafioso is. I believe Diana's theory, but we need more evidence."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
